<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Block Cabochon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=235)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 569 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 70 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a shield

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Free Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

**Trigger** You take damage from a physical attack while you don't have the affixed shield raised

 
</row>

</column>

---

This clear quartz cabochon attaches to the center of your shield. When you activate the cabochon, you use the [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839) reaction even if you hadn’t raised the affixed shield (and even if you don’t normally have that reaction).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Swift Block Cabochon
